title: Creating a Travel Journal for the Pacific Crest Trail
excerpt: I have spent a bunch of time thinking about how I want to share my experience of the pct and have found it very interesting to see what peaks peoples interest.

title: Announcing Ramblings of Eric Metcalf aka Dori
excerpt: Hello all, I am realizing that I have wanted to start and put together a blog for a long time now. These are going to cover several topics including software engineering, PCT and through hiking, cooking, and who else knows.
